summary: Mirabel wins a $5,000 lottery which will enable her to live like a queen in New York. There she meets Sandro, a bellboy who is really a prince, so she does get to be a queen after all.
cast: Francis Lederer|Frances Dee|Benita Hume|Alan Mowbray|Lennox Pawle|Adele St. Maur|Akim Tamiroff|Luis Alberni|Lionel Stander|Ferdinand Gottschalk|Richard Carle|Lenita Lane|Barbara Fritchie|Paul Hurst|Robert Greig|Iris Adrian|Mary Akin|Maidena Armstrong|Lynn Bari|Jane Barnes|Agostino Borgato|Wade Boteler|Al Bridge|Neal Burns|Spencer Charters|Vic Chatten|Russ Clark|Eddie Fetherston|Eddie Foster|Jack Hatfield|Rodney Hildebrand|George Humbert|Paul Irving|Brady Kline|Walter Lawrence|Dorothy Mathews|Paul McVey|Frank Melton|Torben Meyer|Edmund Mortimer|Jack Mower|Esther Muir|Jack Mulhall|John T. Murray|Rudolf Myzet|Anne O'Neal|Rita Owin|Gunner Paulson|Thomas Pogue|Hector V. Sarno|Charles Sellon|William Stelling|Fred Sylva|Phil Tead|Maidel Turner|Fred Wallace|Ruth Warren|Billy Wayne
title: La alegre mentira
